description: Section 73 application to vary planning conditions AG20 and AG27 of planning permission P011500 dated 30th May 2002. The proposed change to AG27 would allow the number of non association football single day major events to increase from 6 to 9 and allow the maximum number of music concerts events to increase from 3 to 6.  The number of Sundays on which these events could occur in one year would also increase from 1 to 3.  The proposed change to AG20 would allow the location for measuring the music noise levels to be agreed between the council and the Stadium operator and the amplified sound to be controlled in accordance with any subsequent guidance that may supersede the  Code of Practise on Environmental Noise Control at Concerts, The Noise Council, 1995.
decision_conditions: REASON:The proposed changes to the condition AG27 to allow an increase in the number of non association football single day major events from 6 to 9 and the distribution of events to include a greater number of Sundays, along with the increased sound levels potentially allowed by changes to AG20, would cause unacceptable harm to the amenity and functioning of the local area to the detriment of Islington's residents.  The proposal would be contrary to polices DM 4.2, DM4.3 and DM6.1 of Islingtons Development Management Policies.
